info.title: Funds API
info.description: This API allows customers to see available funds to invest and manage their portfolio with Banco Bpi.

206.description: Partial response with pagination values in header

get.description: Returns a list of all funds that are available for the customer to invest in
Returns dddthe details of a fund
Returns all portfolio positions of a customer. Position is a subscription at a specific fund.
Returns the details of a position

Returns the quotation history of a specified fund. If no filters are specified it returns the most recent quotation.
You can specify a date interval or a certain number of sample points. If both, the date interval with prevail.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: only return quotations from dates after this filter. (YYYY-MM-DD) [Date ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html)

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: 1. only return quotations from dates before this filter. (YYYY-MM-DD) [Date ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html)

get.description: Returns the details of a quotation for a specified fund
Returns the investment plan list of a given position

parameters.name: fundId
parameters.description: only return investment plans of the specified fund.

post.description: Creates a new investment plan for a customer in a specified position. An invesment plan adds or redemption value recurrently from customer's fund based in a specified date.

get.description: Returns the details of a specified investment plan
Returns a list of all orders for a specified position

parameters.name: fundId
parameters.description: only return orders from positions of the specified fund.

post.description:
Creates an order for a specified position. The customer can create the following types of orders:
* A subscription order, if it is the first order. A subscription order, when completed, represents a subscription agreement between the customer and the fund. When creating the first order for the customer, a portfolio will be created at the time of the agreement,
	allowing the customer to manage subscriptions and make orders in his portfolio. 
* A buy order increases the customer's position on a given fund
* A redemption order decreases the customer's position on a given fund

The orders will be pending and available for cancellation until the cut-off window

get.description: Returns the details of a specified order for a position

put.description: Updates a specified order for a position

delete.description: Cancels a specified order if inside the cut-off window

fund-common.title: Fund Common
fund-common.description: The properties that are shared amongst all versions of the Fund model.

redemptionNotice.description: To indicate a period in days to wait a redemption

redemption.description: Só temos uma comissão de resgate? Não temos uma lista de vários periodos? Primeiros 90 dias, primeiros 180 dias e após 365

transference.description: É comissão de transferência. O que significado de comissão de transferência?

fund-output.title: Fund Output
fund-output.description: The properties that are included when fetching a list of Funds.

fund-output-detailed.title: Fund Output Detailed
fund-output-detailed.description: The properties that are included when fetching a single Fund.

investment-plan-common.title: InvestmentPlan Common
investment-plan-common.description: The properties that are shared amongst all versions of the InvestmentPlan model.

startDate.description: Start date of the plan. (YYYY-MM-DD) [Date ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html)

endDate.description: End date of the plan. (YYYY-MM-DD) [Date ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html)

investmentDay.description: Day that will occur the automatic investment

nextInvestmentDate.description: Date that will occur the next automatic investment. (YYYY-MM-DD) [Date ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html)

tags.name: Funds
tags.description: Allow customers to see a list of available funds to invest

tags.description: Allow custormers to create investment plans that add or redemption value recurrently in funds
